A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After Episode I\, Star Wars fans thought it could never get worse. After TFA\, fans were hopeful for a trilogy worthy of the original. Sadly this movie sets a new rock bottom far worse than episode I could have ever imagined. The special effects and CGI are phenomenal\, the soundtrack harkens back to the majesty of episodes 3-6. But even a polished turd is still a turd. Plot holes galore\, minimal character development and in fact some characters just change personalities all togetherness. Extreme issues with comedic timing\, tone and theme. After such promise with TFA and Rogue One\, this movie desecrates everything Star Wars fans hold dear. The worst star wars movie ever made.
